createRuleModal.formTip: Try to keep it simple and separate rules that aren't related. You can apply as many rules as you like.

createRuleModal.multiSelectLabel: Select one or more of the following:
createRuleModal.wildCardsContent_: Any single character. You can stack these, e.g. AB12CD3 would match the pattern _ _ _ _ _ _
